flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
器用に　動く　尻尾の　先を　手のひらの
代りに　使っていたら　反対に　両手が
不器用に　なってしまった　ポケモンだ。

Aipom’s tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly
manipulated. However, because the Pokémon uses its tail so
much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.

La coda di Aipom termina in un’appendice a forma di mano
dotata di grande abilità. Tuttavia, poiché il Pokémon usa
così tanto la coda, le sue vere mani sono diventate molto
maldestre.

La cola de Aipom termina en una especie de mano a la que,
con un poco de cabeza, se le puede dar muy buen uso. Pero
hay un problema: como se ha acostumbrado a usarla mucho,
las de verdad se le han vuelto algo torponas.

An Griffels Schweif befindet sich ein handähnliches Anhängsel,
mit dem es geschickt zu Werke gehen kann. Da dieses
Pokémon sehr häufig seinen Schweif einsetzt, wirken seine
Hände eher plump.

L’extrémité de la queue de Capumain ressemble à une main
et peut être utilisée de façon ingénieuse. Malheureusement,
ce Pokémon utilise tellement sa queue que ses véritables
mains sont devenues très maladroites.

능숙하게 움직이는 꼬리 끝을 손바닥
대신 사용하다 보니 반대로 양손이
둔해져 버린 포켓몬이다.

きように　うごく　しっぽの　さきを　てのひらの
かわりに　つかっていたら　はんたいに　りょうてが
ぶきように　なってしまった　ポケモンだ。

器用に　動く　尻尾の　先を　手のひらの
代りに　使っていたら　反対に　両手が
不器用に　なってしまった　ポケモンだ。

Aipom’s tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly
manipulated. However, because the Pokémon uses its tail so
much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.

La coda di Aipom termina in un’appendice a forma di mano
dotata di grande abilità. Tuttavia, poiché il Pokémon usa
così tanto la coda, le sue vere mani sono diventate molto
maldestre.

La cola de Aipom termina en una especie de mano a la que,
con un poco de cabeza, se le puede dar muy buen uso. Pero
hay un problema: como se ha acostumbrado a usarla mucho,
las de verdad se le han vuelto algo torponas.

An Griffels Schweif befindet sich ein handähnliches Anhängsel,
mit dem es geschickt zu Werke gehen kann. Da dieses
Pokémon sehr häufig seinen Schweif einsetzt, wirken seine
Hände eher plump.

L’extrémité de la queue de Capumain ressemble à une main
et peut être utilisée de façon ingénieuse. Malheureusement,
ce Pokémon utilise tellement sa queue que ses véritables
mains sont devenues très maladroites.

능숙하게 움직이는 꼬리 끝을 손바닥
대신 사용하다 보니 반대로 양손이
둔해져 버린 포켓몬이다.

きように　うごく　しっぽの　さきを　てのひらの
かわりに　つかっていたら　はんたいに　りょうてが
ぶきように　なってしまった　ポケモンだ。

力強い　尻尾だけで
木の枝に　ぶら下がって
体を　支えることが　できる。

Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a
tree branch and hold itself up in the air.

La sua coda è così forte che può appendersi a un
albero e rimanere sospeso.

Su cola es tan potente que puede usarla para
agarrarse a la rama de un árbol y no caer.

Sein Schweif ist so kräftig, dass es sich stundenlang
damit an einem Ast in der Luft halten kann.

Sa queue est si forte qu’il peut l’utiliser pour se
suspendre aux branches des arbres.

힘이 센 꼬리만으로
나뭇가지에 매달려서
몸을 지탱할 수 있다.

ちからづよい　しっぽだけで
きの　えだに　ぶらさがって
からだを　ささえることが　できる。

高い　木の上で　暮らしている。
枝から　枝へ　飛び移るとき
尻尾で　巧みに　バランスをとる。

It lives atop tall trees. When leaping from branch to
branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance.

Vive in cima agli alberi più alti. Usando abilmente
la coda, mantiene l’equilibrio quando salta di ramo
in ramo.

Vive en lo alto de los árboles. Cuando salta de rama
en rama, usa su cola para equilibrarse.

Es lebt in den Kronen großer Bäume. Es hüpft von
Ast zu Ast und balanciert mit seinem Schweif.

Il vit sur les plus hautes cimes. Sautant de branche
en branche, sa queue lui assure un bon équilibre.

높은 나무 위에서 살고 있다.
나뭇가지에서 가지로 건너뛸 때
꼬리로 능숙하게 밸런스를 잡는다.

たかい　きの　うえで　くらしている。
えだから　えだへ　とびうつるとき
しっぽで　たくみに　バランスをとる。

It lives high among the treetops.
It can use its tail as freely and
cleverly as its hands.

It lives high among the treetops.
It can use its tail as freely and
cleverly as its hands.

It lives high among the treetops.
It can use its tail as freely and
cleverly as its hands.

Sa queue est aussi agile que ses
mains. Il vit en haut des grands
arbres.

cleverly as its hands.

mains. Il vit en haut des grands
arbres.

use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in the air.

It lives high among the treetops.
It can use its tail as freely and
cleverly as its hands.

It lives atop giant trees.
It wraps its tail around a branch
so it won’t fall off while asleep.

It uses its tail to pluck fruits
that are out of reach. Its tail is
more adept than its real hands.

Its tail is so powerful that it can use it
to grab a tree branch and hold itself up
in the air.

from branch to branch, it deftly uses its

Its tail ends with a dexterous, handlike
appendage. However, because it uses the
tail so much, AIPOM’s real hands have
become rather clumsy.

AIPOM’s tail ends in a hand-like
appendage that can be cleverly
manipulated. However, because the POKéMON uses its
tail so much, its real hands have become
rather clumsy.

AIPOM’s tail ends in a hand-like
appendage that can be cleverly
manipulated. However, because the POKéMON uses its
tail so much, its real hands have become
rather clumsy.

It uses its tail
to hang on to tree
branches. It uses its momentum to
swing from one
branch to another.

It lives atop tall
trees. When leap­
ing from branch to branch, it
deftly uses its
tail for balance.

Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.
